entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High 10. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
